question: Who hosts the “At Home” reception for freedom fighters, as a part of Anniversary of the Quit India Movement?
explanation:
The President of India honoured 202 freedom fighters across the country. This was done on the occasion of the 78th anniversary of Quit India Day. 
Every year, on this occasion, the President of India hosts an “At Home” reception at the Rashtrapati Bhavan to honour the freedom fighters. But this year, State/UT governments are requested to honour the freedom fighters at their homes, on behalf of the President.
